section.title: Tutorial1: show all the gene names of the genes in FlyMine
section.para: This page will guide you through the query: show all the gene names of the genes in FlyMine. The aim of this query tutorial is to illustrate how to show a particular field for all the objects in a particular class. This query involves:

listitem.para: Selecting the gene name field to show in the output.
Select the starting point for your query. In this case, Gene.

The model browser will now be displaying the Gene class and it's fields. Navigate to the name field and press show. The gene name field will appear at the bottom of the query builder in the 'Fields selected for output' list.
Press 'Show results' to display the name of the genes in FlyMine:
